summary: This document is a bank statement for Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of November 1, 2013, to November 30, 2013. It details account activity, including deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, indicating a balance of $2,480.00 at the end of the period.

persons.name: Philip Fintchrc
persons.context: Philip Fintchrc is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account holder, Shocker Holdings LLC.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Shocker Holdings LLC, located at 27 High Tech Blvd, Thomasville, NC.
The statement period covers November 1, 2013, to November 30, 2013.
The beginning balance was $2,512.00, with an ending balance of $2,480.00.
A service charge of $32.00 was withdrawn on November 13, 2013.
The document indicates that the account did not meet the criteria for waiving the standard monthly service charge.
